solution_line_template: If each shelf has {books_per_shelf} books, then the {num_shelves} shelves have {num_shelves}*{books_per_shelf} = {total_books} books.

Since the total number of books on the shelves is the same as the distance that Karen bikes back home, biking to and from the library takes {total_books}+{total_books} = <<{total_books}+{total_books}={total_distance}>>{total_distance} miles
